name: smart-city-dashboard
description: Dashboard Smart City pour la mobilité et le trafic à Genève

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && if exist dist rd /s /q dist && if exist node_modules rd /s /q node_modules
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && if exist build rd /s /q build && if exist node_modules rd /s /q node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.predeploy: npm run validate && npm run build
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run predeploy && echo 'Deploy to staging environment'
scripts.deploy:production: npm run predeploy && echo 'Deploy to production environment'

author: Smart City Geneva Team
